title: TOSY Flying Disc - 16 Million Color RGB or 36 or 360 LEDs, Extremely Bright, Smart Modes, Auto Light Up, Rechargeable, Cool Fun Christmas, Birthday & Camping Gift for Men/Boys/Teens/Kids, 175g frisbee
descriptions:
Introducing the TOSY Flying Disc - the ultimate frisbee experience that will take your outdoor games to a whole new level! With its impressive features and vibrant LED lights, this flying disc is perfect for Christmas, birthdays, camping trips, and any occasion that calls for endless fun.

Featuring either 16 million color RGB or 36 or 360 LEDs, the TOSY Flying Disc will dazzle you with its brightness and stunning light display. Its LEDs are 100 times brighter than any other light-up flying disc, ensuring maximum visibility even in the darkest of nights.

But that's not all - this flying disc is equipped with smart modes and motion sensors that automatically light up the disc, making it a breeze to play in the dark. You can adjust the brightness level and even set a timer mode for added convenience.

Worried about running out of power during your game? Fear not! The TOSY Flying Disc is rechargeable and comes with a USB Type C to C cable for quick and easy charging. In just 30 minutes, you'll be ready to go for a thousand throws or a full 90 minutes match.

Designed with durability in mind, this frisbee is made to withstand all your outdoor adventures. It is waterproof and built to professional ultimate standards, ensuring it can withstand the toughest conditions.

The TOSY Flying Disc weighs 175 grams, making it the perfect weight for accurate throws and precise flight. It's comfortable to grip and suitable for performing freestyle tricks, adding an extra element of excitement to your game.

Whether you're playing a game of Beersbee, Polish Horseshoes, or simply enjoying a casual throw-around, the TOSY Flying Disc is the game-changer you've been waiting for. It's a fantastic gift for men, boys, teens, and kids alike - providing hours of entertainment and countless memories.

Don't miss out on the TOSY Flying Disc - the ultimate flying disc experience that combines innovation, durability, and endless fun. Grab yours now and get ready to take your outdoor games to new heights!
